backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing alumni profiles, events, and announcements with admin/approval-based access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme design tokens and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, theme provider, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/MembersAdm: Admin panel to view member approval statuses and approve or reject users with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminOnly.tsx: Component that conditionally renders children only for admins and shows an access-denied fallback otherwise.
frontend/src/components/AlumniCard.tsx: UI card displaying summary details of an alumni profile with click handling.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileDet: Dialog for viewing full alumni profile details including bio, location, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileFor: Form component for creating or editing an alumni profile with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementAdmi: Admin panel trigger that opens a dialog for creating new announcements.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementCard: Displays an announcement with title, date badge, and formatted content.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementComp: Dialog for composing and submitting a new announcement using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Site footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Main site header with navigation, user menu, mobile menu, and auth controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state and actions.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryFilters: Filter panel for alumni directory with search, year, and department selectors.
Admin panel trigger that opens a dialog to create a new event.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: Card component showing event details including date, time, location, and description.
frontend/src/components/EventEditorDialo: Dialog UI for creating, updating, and deleting events with form handling and mutation calls.
Wrapper component that checks authentication and approval state, showing gated UI or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Component that blocks access until user is authenticated, showing a signâ€‘in prompt or custom fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccess.ts: Hook combining auth, approval, and admin checks into a unified access-control state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hook exposing current user identity, profile, and loading state derived from Internet Identity and profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hooks managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Hook querying backend to determine whether the authenticated caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating alumni profiles, events, announcements, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Renders a static list of alumni activities with categorized cards and details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays the admin dashboard with permission-controlled tabs for managing members, content, and events.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays announcements with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Shows a searchable and filterable directory of alumni profiles with detail view support.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Renders upcoming and past events with tabs, loading states, and event cards, requiring approved access.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a placeholder gallery grid for approved users with optional empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showcasing features, hero section, and navigation actions based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows approved users to view, create, or edit their profile with loading and save handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for building the Gurukul Alumni Association app with RBAC, member approval, and content management.
